page.title: 06BULMER SCHOOL
page.content: BULMER PRIMARY SCHOOL IS JUST OFF CHURCH ROAD IN THE HAVEN GROUND AREA.THIS CHURCH SCHOOL CONTROLLED BY E.C.C. TAKES ABOUT 75 FIVE TO ELEVEN YEAR OLDS FROM 8 SURROUNDING VILLAGES. IT WAS BUILT IN 1965 TO AN INTERESTING OCTAGONAL DESIGN & THE THREE CLASSROOMS OPENING ON TO A CENTRAL HALL CAN ALL BE OPENED UP TO MAKE ONE LARGE SPACE.THE TWO ACRE FIELD ON WHICH IT STANDS WAS FORMERLY USED FOR ALLOTMENTS AND THE SOUTH HEDGE DATES BACK TO NORMAN TIMES. THE BACKGROUND OF THE PUPILS HAS CHANGED GREATLY IN THE LAST 80 YEARS.BETWEEN 1895 & 1900 48 OUT OF 74 FATHERS WORKED ON THE LAND. BETWEEN 1980 & 1985 THERE WERE ONLY TWO FARMWORKER FATHERS AND PROFESSIONAL & BUSINESS MEN HAVE TAKEN OVER FROM THE ARTISANS OF THE 19TH CENTURY.
